name: Barte
text:
...Hm, ugh.
Huh... what happened to me...?
I'm sure—

name: Barte
text:
—Ah, that's right!
Ganran!!
Where's Ganran!?

name: Barte
text:
...That hazy feeling, it's gone?
And the monsters... aren't here either.
—Tch!!

I panicked.
The smell that hung over Garunderra Village,
the commotion caused by the monsters incident—

My master, who was right in front of me until just now...
In an instant, he was gone.
The next moment, I was in a terrifyingly quiet grassland.

I ran and ran desperately.
I wanted to know where this was... And then.
I realized it when I reached a cliff.

name: Barte
text:
...
Where am I...?
Here...

—That I had been transported
to a completely unknown place.

At first, I thought I had come to the afterlife.
I wondered if I had died when I was attacked by the monsters back then.

name: Barte
text:
...
Alright...

Where in the world am I?
I desperately suppressed my anxiety,
removed my forehead protector, and opened my 'eye'.

This 'eye' was something Ganran always told me to keep hidden,
not to show to others.

This 'eye' can see things that the two eyes on either side cannot.
To put it another way... perhaps the 'wave of life'.

I wanted to confirm. If I was truly alive.
If there was any human activity in this terrifyingly quiet world.

name: Barte
text:
...What is this world...?
The atmosphere is filled with life...
A 'current' is being created...

name: Barte
text:
I've never seen it like this before.
...Ugh.
If I keep looking, I'll get dizzy...

It's common for the waves emitted by plants to drift hazily on the ground.
But this world was different.

Throughout the entire atmosphere, evenly.
That haziness drifted, creating a large current.
—From this, I understood three things.

One is that I don't seem to be dead.
Otherwise, I wouldn't be able to see the haze coming from my body.

Another is that there's probably no one in this world at all,
but rather, it's overflowing with life.

And the last one is... probably.
This is a different world
from the one I originally came from.

As I tried to close my 'eye',
I could sense someone approaching from behind,
due to the change in the current.

After properly sealing my 'eye',
I took a defensive stance just in case.
—However, what appeared was.

name: Barte
text:
...Eh?
Huh...?

It was a group of aliens,
speaking an incomprehensible language.

...After they helped me,
I got various pieces of information. I then ended up
at the Blacksmith's Guild in that city.

They were all good-natured people.
And above all, they were all serious about craftsmanship,
and we got along very well.

Life surrounded by companions with similar hobbies wasn't bad at all;
in fact, it was rather enjoyable.

...However, no matter how enjoyable my days were,
what happened back then kept flickering in my mind.

name: Ganran
text:
—Barte!
Grab my hand!
Alright, don't you dare let go!!

name: Barte
text:
...
Ganran...

While adhering to what I was taught and incorporating what I heard from my companions,
I've created various things in my own style.

I say it myself, but thanks to the sheer volume of work,
I think my skills have improved considerably.

However, that growth—
I can't show it to the person
I most want to see it.

Ganran... I still have so much
I want to learn from you.

So... definitely wait for me.
No matter what, I'll come back...
and show you the blades I forge.

Chapter 6:
The Apprentice Mage

After several days of crossing to the opposite shore by ferry,
the group continued their journey, tracing the presence of the 'rift',
and entered a certain mountain area.

What they found there was a lush mountain forest,
the ruins of a mountain village that was strangely well-maintained for being abandoned.
And then—

name: Monsters
text:
Gigogogogoh!!
Gipieehh!!

A surprisingly lively swarm of grown monsters
for a place with no human presence.

options.text: Whoa, they're energetic for an uninhabited area!
These monsters, they're the ones who... in this mountain village!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Whoa there!? ...Geez,
I guess they ate a lot and grew big, huh!?
Gotta cut 'em up quickly!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Even so... whoa!?
Damn these monsters, using the terrain like pros!

name: Barte
text:
Seriously, these guys
seem to be deliberately hiding...!
Are monsters really that smart!?

options.text: Monsters aren't supposed to have intelligence!
I've seen monsters adapt to their environment sometimes, I guess.

name: Gnomon
text:
Are they individuals optimized for hunting in this location, perhaps?
...That's quite troublesome.

From the bushes, from the treetops.
Utilizing the complex terrain formed by dense vegetation and undulating ground—

Monsters suddenly leaped out from various directions,
launching surprise attacks.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Who are you to talk?
However, this situation
isn't good...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haaah~, I wish they'd just make some rustling noises with the leaves or something!
Even I'm getting tired of this!

options.text: Hydoor, they're coming from the left!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Phew, thanks, [Player]!
But seriously, I don't know where they're coming from, man...!

name: Gnomon
text:
There's a limit to how much we can move by sight.
...However, it's also not a good idea
to constantly ask the Hero for instructions.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
True, it might be unreasonable to expect them to take care of everyone...!
Damn it, what should we do!?

name: Barte
text:
...Tch, they're coming!
There, take that!

name: Purple Larva
text:
Gigeh!!?
Gugugu...!!

In such a situation, Barte read the presence of the monsters,
accurately attacked them, and made them disappear.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...Whoa!
You're amazing, Barte-chan!
You can read the monsters's movements!?

name: Barte
text:
Not so much 'read' them, but...!
—Danzo, behind you!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—Whoa, seriously!?
Take that!

name: Yellow Larva
text:
Gyagih!?
Gigigi!!

name: Barte
text:
If I do this too much, I'll get dizzy, but...!
[Player], I'll help too!
Let's get through this quickly!!

options.text: I don't know how you know, but thanks!

text:
The pattern on Barte's forehead
moved with a glare again.

name: Barte
text:
—Gnomon!
It's going to jump out right in front of you!

name: Gnomon
text:
Ah, thank you!
—Cost 1, Fireball!

name: Blue Larva
text:
Gigagagaga!!
Gugehh!!

name: Village Elder
text:
...Thank you very much for saving us, Hero-sama!
Please, be careful on your journey!

options.text: No, no, we just did what was natural.
I'm glad we could bring you back safely!

text:
After the battle with the monster swarm ended.
The group left the mountain village, seen off by the villagers they had successfully rescued.

name: Barte
text:
Well, I thought it was going to be tough when we were surrounded,
but it somehow worked out!

name: Hydoor
text:
Hah, she's already recovered.
Even though she looked seasick
for a while after the battle.

name: Barte
text:
I-I can't help it...!
If you run your eyes all over the place like that,
you're bound to get dizzy!

name: Barte
text:
It's true I was feeling down then, but seeing all sorts of things
from the mountain folk has changed my mood!
It's not just back to zero, it's positive!

name: Danzo
text:
Oh~, was it that good?
The mountain people's hunting equipment.
You were talking about it so much~!

name: Barte
text:
Yeah! After all, since coming to this world,
I haven't had many opportunities to look around like that!

name: Barte
text:
Blades that have been optimized over time
to suit the local conditions and uses are
still interesting to look at!

name: Barte
text:
Ah, that axe with the hollow inside was
interesting and beautiful...
The one used for stripping tree bark.

name: Barte
text:
The blade's direction is special, so it seems difficult, but
it's worth trying to forge one...!
Alright, next time I find a kiln, I'll try making one!

name: Danzo
text:
That's good, that's good!
It's best to get your hands moving
while your creative impulses are tingling!

name: Hydoor
text:
What are you gonna use that for!?
It'll just be extra baggage...
But... that doesn't really matter.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, [Player] and Gnomon.
How's the 'rift' location?
Have you found it?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I was able to retrieve traces, but...
[Player]-sama. Please observe.
[Player] concentrated and searched for the location of the 'rift'.

When I looked yesterday, there was certainly a strong reaction around here.
However...

options.text: No good, it seems to have moved further away.
It was definitely around here yesterday, but...

name: Danzo
text:
...I see. Hmm, you know,
you said that the paths where monsters emerge look similar.
Is it that?

name: Hydoor
text:
Lately, it's been repeatedly getting closer and then moving away.
Is the 'rift' itself moving...?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I think both interpretations are correct.
The paths that spew out monsters and the 'rift' are essentially the same path.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's a path that spewed out so many monsters;
I think there's a high possibility of misidentification.

name: Gnomon
text:
—However. If it were truly a mistake,
I don't think such traces would be left behind.

name: Gnomon
text:
Therefore, it might be more accurate to say that the 'rift'
is moving while spewing out monsters.

Gnomon opened the palm of his hand,
which had been clutching something he had picked up from the ground earlier.

In it was a shimmering substance,
made of particles smaller than sand.

options.text: You picked it up at the previously observed location too, right?

name: Barte
text:
Oh? What's this...?
It doesn't seem to be some kind of iron sand, does it?

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes. These are nanomachines covering the 'rift' — Ether Pumps.
What I'm picking up are the damaged ones
that have fallen off and become unrecoverable.

name: Danzo
text:
Ah, you mentioned that before.
That the 'rift' is covered by nanomachines.
You call them Ether Pumps?

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes. They completely cover the surface of the path,
continuously drawing Ether from the connected parallel universe and pouring it into this universe.
They are relics of the past.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's precisely because these are still functioning
that this universe is heading towards destruction,
and people are coming from other universes via the 'Rainbow'.

name: Barte
text:
What a nuisance, huh?
We were drawn in by that, and ended up here, right?

name: Barte
text:
...But if it's still functioning properly,
then why are such fragments falling off?

name: Gnomon
text:
Even though it's still functioning,
over 6000 years have passed since the Ether Pump began operating.

name: Gnomon
text:
It seems that as it swayed and flexed with the flow of Ether,
it finally started showing signs of wear and tear.

name: Gnomon
text:
Malfunctioning nanomachines are generated, and those parts fall off,
creating holes in the membrane, exposing a part of the 'rift'.

name: Gnomon
text:
What's written in my 'grimoire'
is a 'magic' that detects detached nanomachines
existing around such holes.

name: Gnomon
text:
By repurposing this and combining it with a 'magic'
that gives directionality to the 'Observer's' observation ability,
I am able to detect locations.

name: Gnomon
text:
And by reaching the closest spot to the hole and observing the 'rift',
and then implementing a method to close it,
the goal of this journey will be complete.

options.text: That's the place we're aiming for on this journey, huh?
The problem is the 'method to close it', I guess...

name: Danzo
text:
Ah, so the fact that detached ones are falling means
that the hole created in the 'rift' definitely passed through here, right? I understand!

name: Danzo
text:
Does that mean it's physically closer than before!?
That's good, that's good!!

name: Hydoor
text:
But what good is picking up such broken machines?
You seem to be researching something with 'magic' every night.

name: Gnomon
text:
Even though they are broken, not all recorded information has disappeared.
What I am doing is extracting that information.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's a steady process of organizing fragmentary information, but...
the refinement of the method to close the 'rift' is also progressing smoothly.

name: Gnomon
text:
If I can collect more data and proceed with the analysis,
I think I can narrow down to a definitive method.

options.text: Thanks for all your hard work every night...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, this is my mission.
It's not something to be praised for.
...But, thank you.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Oh, and also.
Regarding the method for you all to return to your original universe,
there are also signs that something can be done about it.

name: Gnomon
text:
If we can reach the 'rift' and somehow connect a path
to your original universe from there...
I think it can be done.

name: Barte
text:
Seriously!?
Until now, it was 'whether we could go back,' right!?
That's a huge step forward!!

name: Danzo
text:
Wow, that's hopeful news!
...But what exactly does 'somehow' mean?

name: Gnomon
text:
About that... it's not quite clear yet.
But it's certain that things or people connected to Hero-sama
will be the key.

name: Gnomon
text:
Because only when the Hero-sama clearly observes it,
a path connecting this 'Endangered World' and
the original universe will be established for the first time.

name: Hydoor
text:
W-What, that's more vague than I thought...
Hey, [Player].
Don't you have any idea what it could be?

name: Gnomon
text:
The principle is the same as when summoning a ryekie's Parallel Weapon.
All you need to do is observe a clue that leads to your original universe.

options.text: Even if you say that, well...
A connection to the original universe, huh?
Was there anything like that, even...?

text:
As [Player] pondered about something that connected to the original universe—
At that moment, something inexplicable appeared in their vision.

name: Danzo
text:
...Huh?
What's wrong, boss?
What are you doing, a mime act?

name: Hydoor
text:
A 'chain'...? I don't see anything like that...
No, wait, the fact that you saw it at this timing means...

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes. The fact that it became visible the moment you focused your attention
means there's a strong possibility it's a clue.

name: Gnomon
text:
[Player]-sama.
Was that 'chain' connected somewhere?

options.text: No, it disappeared before I could confirm.
I don't even know what it was...

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see.
If that was a connection to the original universe,
I thought the 'rift' would also be at the end of that 'chain'.

name: Danzo
text:
Well, it looks like we'll have to go with the straightforward approach.
But if that really is a clue to returning to the original universe,
that's a huge advantage, isn't it!

name: Barte
text:
That's right, that's quite a promising story!
Well, I'll help with the location search too, so
let's work hard together!

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah, with hope, I can search with much more motivation!
So, which way should we head next?

name: Gnomon
text:
—[Player]-sama.
When you observed the 'rift' just now,
which direction did you see it in?

options.text: The direction is still vague, somehow.
Gnomon, can you please use that 'magic'?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Understood.
Even though it's getting closer, the direction and distance still seem ambiguous.

name: Gnomon
text:
Please bow your heads—even so.
Although I proposed it as a method,
this 'magic' really costs a lot.

name: Hydoor
text:
Don't be stingy.
The fate of the world is at stake,
so no one will complain if you use it lavishly.

name: Gnomon
text:
...It's not so much the money, but the consumption of material coins that's the problem.
To resupply coins, we have to stop at a market.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's not certain that we'll pass through any transit points with a market from now on...
So I need to carefully manage the number of uses.

name: Danzo
text:
...In that case.
How about we get help from another person who's already here,
someone who can see things we can't?

Saying that, Danzo turned his gaze towards Barte.
Barte showed a startled expression.

name: Barte
text:
—O-Me!?
Why in the world...

name: Danzo
text:
Why? You were just able to predict the monsters's movements, weren't you?
Besides, something's bothering me—

name: Danzo
text:
That thing on your forehead that was rolling around
when you were reading the monsters's movements.
...You're flustered, so I hit the nail on the head?

name: Barte
text:
...Haa. You're observant, aren't you?
Well, it's fine if it's you guys.
Since we're traveling together, it'll be exposed eventually.
Barte sighed and slightly shifted the goggle-like object on her forehead.
Beneath it was the same pattern that had appeared on her forehead when she.

That eye-shaped thing
opened from the center to the left and right,
rolled around like an eyeball, and then closed.

name: Hydoor
text:
Whoa, what's that!?
A third 'eye'...!?

name: Barte
text:
...Y-Yeah, that's right.
I'm told not to show it to people,
but I always end up relying on it when the time comes.

name: Gnomon
text:
Is that... a normal eye?
No, I haven't seen anything like it in this universe either,
so I lack knowledge.

name: Barte
text:
No. This 'eye' has slightly weaker vision than a normal one,
but in exchange, it can see the aura
that living beings emit.

name: Barte
text:
That's right.
I haven't been properly taught about it either,
so I only vaguely understand it.

name: Barte
text:
You humans, animals, plants, trees... various living things
are constantly overflowing with aura.

name: Barte
text:
The way it looks changes quite a bit depending on what kind of person they are...
[Player] is amazing.

name: Barte
text:
Sparkling things are constantly swirling around your body.
It's so mesmerizing, I could watch it forever.

options.text: It seems different from what an 'Observer' can see.

name: Barte
text:
And. Normally, only living things emit this kind of aura.
...But this universe is strange.

name: Barte
text:
The atmosphere everywhere is filled with aura, as if emitted by living things,
and it's constantly flowing somewhere.

name: Barte
text:
It's like constantly looking at water with paint dropped in it...
If I stare at it too much, I feel sick.

name: Barte
text:
In the universe I came from, I never saw it like this...
But that's precisely why I can see things.

name: Barte
text:
I could find the monsters's location thanks to this aura flow.
Monsters don't emit aura, you see.

name: Barte
text:
It's easy to spot something moving through the aura-filled current.
That's how it works.

name: Barte
text:
...Well, it's something only possible in this world.
If I keep looking, I really get dizzy, so
I only look when necessary.

name: Danzo
text:
I see... So that's how Barte-chan
could read the monsters's movements, which only an 'Observer' could normally grasp, huh?

name: Gnomon
text:
Hmm... This world is filled with aura. That's also a strange story...
Is it due to the influence of the biocompatible nanomachines?

name: Hydoor
text:
I don't really get it...
But that aura, it flows from somewhere to somewhere, right?
Like an ocean current?

name: Hydoor
text:
For example, does the flow direction change with the wind or something?
Does it always flow in the same direction?

name: Barte
text:
Yeah. I don't keep this eye open all the time, so I can't be sure...
But it always feels like it's flowing in the same direction.

name: Barte
text:
From what I just saw...
it's probably over there?
Beyond that tall mountain.

name: Gnomon
text:
...It seems worth investigating.
[Player]-sama.
Please lower your head once more.

name: Gnomon
text: And, would you please observe the location of the 'rift'?

name: Gnomon
text:
—Cost 5.
Observation directional correction, 60 seconds.
Target, Ether Pump.

After receiving Gnomon's 'magic',
[Player] once again observed the location of the 'rift'.

Then... surprisingly,
a massive path reaction was observed
precisely in the direction Barte had pointed.

options.text: It seems to be in that direction.
It's exactly the direction Barte indicated.

text:
[Player] pointed in the direction where the reaction was—
the same direction as Barte.

name: Danzo
text:
...Whoa.
Isn't this, perhaps, a major discovery!?

name: Barte
text:
No way...
The 'rift' is in the direction the aura is flowing, you mean!?

name: Gnomon
text:
It could be a coincidence...
but if it's really true, that's very reassuring.
Let's try it a few times and verify it.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, hey, that's amazing, Barte!
If it's true, that's a huge achievement!
It'll also reduce [Player]'s burden!

name: Barte
text:
Ah, yeah... no way.
To think this 'eye' could ever
be useful to the party...

name: Barte
text:
—Alright!
At this point, I'll help with anything I can!

name: Barte
text:
Ah, but please excuse me if I can't keep it open all the time.
As I said earlier, I really get dizzy, and opening this 'eye' requires concentration.

name: Barte
text:
Don't mention it!
We're companions moving towards the same goal, right?
There's no need to hold back!

name: Barte
text:
Alright then... let's go!
The 'rift' is close now, isn't it?
Let's find it quickly!

name: Hydoor
text:
Yeah!!
Let's save this world properly—
And return to our original world!!

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm~, before I knew it, there are tons of tasks, huh?
But that's what being a 'Hero' is all about,
completing everything perfectly, right? Let's get excited!

name: Gnomon
text:
...
Comrades...

name: Gnomon
text:
—Eh?
Ah, yes.
...Shall we go?

[Player] and the others continued their journey.
Determining their direction with Gnomon's 'magic'
and [Player]'s observation.

name: Gnomon
text:
—[Player]-sama.
How is it?

name: Barte
text: ...What I can see is also that way.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ohh, the same direction again!?
This... surely it's for real!?

name: Danzo
text:
Yeah, yeah,
the credibility is just increasing!
So, Gnomon, what do you think?

name: Gnomon
text:
As long as I don't know what that 'biological aura' is,
I can't make a definitive statement, but...

name: Gnomon
text:
If it matches this closely, then it seems safe to believe it seriously.
From now on, let's alternate with Barte-sama for observation.
With the help of Barte's 'eye' and fighting monsters along the way...

name: Adult Yellow Monster
text:
Gigagagagagah!!
Pigiehh!!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Tch, they're fast...!
If only I could buy some time for searching and material conversion...
Hydoor-sama!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Oh, leave it to me!!
Oraoraoraah!!
Who wants to be chopped up, huh!!

name: Adult Yellow Monster
text:
Gyagagah!!
Gigih—!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Haha, this isn't even a warm-up!!
Hey Gnomon, can you do it!?

name: Gnomon
text:
—Yes, that's enough,
please step back!
...Radiate!!

name: Red Larva
text:
Gugagagagagah!!?
Gieehh—!!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Whoa, that's more brutal than I thought...
You're burning all the ones
who entered the formation.

name: Gnomon
text:
Rather, is mercy necessary?
The opponent is coming to hunt with all their might,
so we should hunt them back with all our might.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Haha, you're right!
Also, you've finally started relying on me actively!

name: Gnomon
text:
W-Well, that's...
I thought Hydoor-sama, being fast, was the right person for that situation.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Come on, don't be shy!!
I'm happy, it's like I've gained a brother!!

name: Gnomon
text:
B-Brother...?
Isn't that a bit too close for comfort?
It's over...
With Hydoor's and Danzo's power, their new Parallel Weapons were fully utilized.

name: Gnomon
text:
—I see. So this is the mechanism
that applies correction to the observation ability.
Thank you for your cooperation, Hero-sama.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Hiii, you two.
Don't you get tired from staring at screens
in this kind of camp until late at night?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
How about it? I just made a super chill new song,
would you like to listen to it during your break?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey there!?
Aren't you being too cold,
boss!?

options.text: I let him transform, and this happens...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh. What's with that gigantic cold shoulder?
Oh no, just like the current lord.
I'm seriously going to cry.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Danzo-sama.
Your concern is appreciated,
but I'd like to make a little more progress.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Oh? Well, if you two are fine with it, then it's fine.
But don't overwork yourselves, okay?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
It's true that you two are the pillars of this party.
But if you're constantly on edge,
you'll run out of strength at a crucial moment, you know?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
So... rest when you can.
You might not understand it when you're young,
but your concentration doesn't last forever, you know?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Understood, I'll keep that in mind.
By the way... you say 'when you're young',
how old are you, Danzo-sama?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Oh, didn't I tell you?
I'm 27.

options.text: You're quite mature for your age, huh?
Isn't it a bit early to talk about youth?

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes... even though there's only an eight-year difference...
How should I put it?
...Danzo-sama, you're amazing.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Whoa, whoa, what kind of reaction is that!?
Just so you know, the average age of ninjas
is different from normal humans, okay!?
—Some time later, while they were talking about dreams...

name: Barte
text:
Oh... ohh!?
I thought it was dull because it was just rolling around carelessly, but—

name: Barte
text:
This is definitely a sword forged by a renowned blacksmith!!
If sharpened properly, it will surely be beautiful...!

name: Gnomon
text:
If it's found in ruins like this,
it's probably something someone abandoned.
I think it's fine to take it.

name: Gnomon
text:
...However.
Barte-sama truly changes her expression when swords and the like is involved.

name: Barte
text:
Of course!!
I'm training to forge the sharpest,
most beautiful blades!

name: Barte
text:
To one day create something that makes everyone gasp and involuntarily stare in admiration,
I don't cut corners in my research.

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see.
That's why you're looking around at blades everywhere.

name: Barte
text:
Yeah! Soon, with the sharpest masterpiece,
I'm going to make my master gasp!
That's... my immediate goal!

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see.
That's a very wonderful goal, I think.
That's why you want to go back, isn't it?

name: Barte
text:
Well, yeah!
What about you, Gnomon?
Don't you have a dream, and are you researching for it?

name: Gnomon
text:
I... rather, I'm researching because it's my duty,
that's how it is.

name: Barte
text:
Eh? Is that really all there is?
Does motivation really last that long just because it's a duty?

name: Barte
text:
Even if you can't put it into words,
isn't there something inside you?
Your own dream or goal, you know.

name: Gnomon
text:
E-Even if you say that...
Now that you mention it, yes, there is.
...I've never even thought about it.

name: Gnomon
text:
...
My dream, huh...

Gnomon's research progressed,
and the journey steadily moved step by step towards the 'rift'.

name: Gnomon
text:
...
Hmm... No, but.
Surely, there must be other methods...

name: Gnomon
text:
But... I don't have enough materials
or time to think about it anymore...
...

options.text: I made some coffee, would you like some?

name: Gnomon
text:
—Eh? Oh, [Player]-sama.
Coffee... Oh, the bean tea sold at the port town, is that it?
Thank you.

name: Gnomon
text:
My research... is progressing.
Regarding how to close the 'rift' also...
I've pretty much narrowed down the methods.

name: Gnomon
text:
However...
That is...

name: Gnomon
text:
...We've gotten quite close to the 'rift'.
Is this journey almost over?

options.text: It's all thanks to you and Barte.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...No. I just used the 'magic' available to me.
Much of it is thanks to you, Hero-sama, and Barte-sama.

name: Gnomon
text:
Honestly... I was scared at first.
I had lived almost without interacting with other people.

name: Gnomon
text:
I, who was even afraid to shake Danzo-sama's outstretched hand that day...
I wondered if I could lead this journey well.

options.text: I see, you were scared at first...
You've really opened up now, haven't you?
You've become quite easy to talk to.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Yes. Everyone is truly warm...
They firmly hold their dreams and wishes,
and are connected to someone by strong bonds...

name: Gnomon
text:
And... they have courage.
Thanks to that, even I, this 'coward',
was able to journey this far together.

name: Gnomon
text:
If the 'Hero' hadn't been [Player]-sama...
if the party members had been different people...

name: Gnomon
text:
I might have lost my nerve...
and been unable to do anything.

options.text: In fact, you're stronger than me.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Eh?
But...

options.text: I was scared at first too.
Thrown into such an unknown parallel world.
But even so, the reason we made it this far is...
It's thanks to you finding your courage.

name: Gnomon
text:
......
[Player]-sama...

options.text: I'm glad you were my traveling companion.
Please continue to rely on me for a little longer.

name: Gnomon
text:
My courage... huh...
...

Receiving [Player]'s words,
Gnomon fell silent.
He tightly gripped the staff he was holding.

When [Player] glanced at the clock,
the night had already grown quite late.

options.text: Ah, I should get to sleep soon...

name: Gnomon
text:
...Yes.
Goodnight...
...

Gnomon, who was about to see [Player] into the tent,
stood up as if he had made a decision.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Please wait.
[Player]-sama.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Could you gather everyone in the party?
I have something important to discuss.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Regarding how to close the 'rift'.
I have reached a conclusion,
and I would like to talk about it.

At Gnomon's urgent summons,
the group gathered in the center of the camp
under the late-night starry sky.

And then—as a result of his research,
he revealed information about the only conceivable way
to close the 'rift'.

name: Barte
text:
...So, what does that mean?
We need to go outside this universe once, is that it?

name: Danzo
text:
Go outside the 'rift'... and then.
[Player] observes the 'rift' of this universe from the outside... is that right?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Yes, that's correct.
To grasp the full picture of the 'rift' and close it,
that method is the only one.

name: Gnomon
text:
What's necessary to close the giant path that is the 'rift',
is to observe its full picture and to stop the flow of Ether.

name: Gnomon
text:
In both of these, the Ether Pumps covering the 'rift'
from the inside exist as a fatal obstacle.

name: Gnomon
text:
Ether Pumps continuously generate Ether flow.
And... even if a part is destroyed, it self-repairs.

name: Gnomon
text:
Even if one tries to observe and
close the 'rift' while these are active,
the flow of Ether will impede it.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's like trying to build a dam in a raging river without stopping the flow.
It would require an enormous amount of effort.

name: Gnomon
text:
Therefore, we need to stop all Ether Pumps simultaneously,
block the flow, and then go to the other side of the 'rift'—

name: Gnomon
text:
That is, outside the universe,
where the Ether Pumps do not obstruct
the overall observation of the 'rift', and close the path.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, wait.
So that means you've managed to detect
a way to stop the Ether Pumps, right?

name: Hydoor
text:
Then, couldn't we just use that and rip them all off,
and that would be the end of it?

name: Gnomon
text:
...No. While I did discover a 'magic' to stop the Ether Pumps,
it can only temporarily halt them.

name: Gnomon
text:
So, even if we use this stopping magic,
the Ether Pumps will reactivate after a certain period of time.
Moreover—

name: Gnomon
text:
The 'rift' is estimated to be large enough to swallow this entire planet.
It's an immense amount of nanomachines, enough to cover it.

name: Gnomon
text:
It would be difficult to destroy these,
which are firmly adhered to the path,
at a rate that surpasses their self-repair capability.

options.text: Will we be okay going outside the universe?
Will I be able to close it...?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Whether you can actually close it.
And whether you can return to your original universe...
I cannot guarantee that.

name: Gnomon
text:
I do not know everything about the 'Observer''s abilities.
But... it is a fact that no other method has been found.

name: Hydoor
text:
Outside the universe, what kind of place is that...?
Can we breathe?
Can we move?

name: Danzo
text:
Well... Even I, who fly all over the universe,
have never been there. So I don't know.
Can we even go there in the first place...?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Theoretically, it's possible.
After the Hero-sama observes the hole in the 'rift'—

name: Gnomon
text:
If I use a 'magic' to transport you all, relying on that,
you can reach it.
The problem lies beyond that, however...

name: Barte
text:
—Hold on, wait.
Gnomon, what will happen to you?
Will you be saying goodbye to us there?

name: Gnomon
text:
...If I am to reliably transport everyone outside the universe...
I will also need to accompany you outside the universe
to stabilize the 'magic'.

name: Gnomon
text:
However, if the 'rift' is closed that way...
I would not be able to return to this universe.

options.text: Are you okay with that, Gnomon?

name: Gnomon
text:
...
My mission is to help the Hero-sama close the 'rift'.

name: Gnomon
text:
For that...
even if I lose my place to return to,
it should be fine.

name: Gnomon
text:
However... indeed.
I had a slight hesitation in telling you all this answer.

name: Gnomon
text:
I... what am I afraid of?
What is the true nature of this hesitation?
...I don't even know myself.

Everyone was speechless—
That's when it happened.

name: Danzo
text:
[Player]!?
What in the—whoa!?

A sensory disturbance assaulted [Player].
Following that—

name: Barte
text:
Whoaahh!?
E-Earthquake!?
It's pretty big...!

name: Hydoor
text:
I-It's not just shaking...!
What is this sound...!
The sky is crying...!?

A piercing, loud sound that made everyone anxious
dominated the entire area.

name: Gnomon
text:
What, what is that sound...!?
—Tch, my ears are splitting...!

The sound and shaking ceased after a while.
However, at the same time,
the color of the sky began to change.

name: Danzo
text:
...Hey.
Surely, a sunrise at this hour
is too early, isn't it...?

The night sky, which had praised the stars,
suddenly turned white, and then
changed color to blue... and red.

The group, as if by agreement,
climbed to the edge of the grassland—a high vantage point
where they could see the world broadly.

The scene that unfolded there was...
truly one that made them feel
'the end of the world'.

options.text: The sky's color is constantly changing...!

text:
The sky repeatedly flickered between blue and red,
with a large, white, crack-like line
floating in its center.

name: Hydoor
text:
Wha—what is this...?
This isn't just 'something's wrong';
this is beyond that.

name: Danzo
text:
Is this...
what the end of the world looks like...?
This is, seriously...

name: Gnomon
text:
......
It's over...

The group was dumbfounded by the unusual sight.
However, screams that began to rise from below
brought their consciousness back.

name: Villager
text:
Heeeh, h-help...!
Help meee!!

name: Villager
text:
These guys, suddenly from where...!?
Whoa!?

name: Purple Meteorite-type Monster
text:
Gigigih!!!
Pigiehh!!

name: Green Bird-type Monster
text:
Pigaoh!!
Gaoohhh!!

name: Barte
text:
Are those... the people from the settlement we visited yesterday!?
They're being attacked by an outrageous number of monsters!?

name: Gnomon
text:
...This means it's finally time.
The time limit is approaching, perhaps.

options.text: We need to hurry, but those people!
First, we have to help those people!

name: Gnomon
text:
—I understand.
[Player]-sama, transform.
First, let's protect those people.

name: Gnomon
text:
And... we must hurry.
To the location of the 'rift'.
Battle Start

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Tadaaaa!!
Alright, I'll stall them!
Listen to my song!!

name: Green Bird-type Monster
text:
Gyarururu!!
Gugahhh...!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
OK, they're hooked!
Now everyone, now's the time!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Oh yeah!!
—Here goes!!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Target, locked!
Concentrated fire!!

name: Green Bird-type Monster
text:
Gugagagagaga!!?
Gigih...!!

name: Barte
text:
...With this,
it's all of them this time, right!?
How is it!?

name: Blue Monster
text:
Gigogogoh...!
Gipiehh!!

options.text: I thought we had defeated them all...!

name: Gnomon
text:
—This is bad.
They're increasing rapidly
as soon as we deal with them.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Ugh, this is endless!?
We don't have time to be standing around here,
this is totally awful, isn't it!?

name: Barte
text:
Even so, we can't just leave the people of this settlement
in this state, can we!?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Damn it...!
What in the world do we do!?
Isn't there anyone we can entrust this to!?

options.text: I don't know, I don't know but...!
We have no choice but to give up and proceed...!

text:
—Sorry to keep you waiting!
Uraaaah!!

name: Blue Monster
text:
Gigah!?
Gipiehh...

—At that moment.
From somewhere, a figure appeared with a tremendous thunderclap.

...It was a hero, very familiar to [Player],
and heroes who looked very much like other heroes.

name: Hero
text:
Sorry!
Because of this commotion, it took some time to arrive!

name: Hero
text:
—We will take care of this place.
Heroes, please hurry to the 'rift'.

name: Barte
text:
I-Is that okay!?
But, just the two of you...!

name: Hero
text:
...Don't worry.
Our reinforcements will also arrive here shortly.

name: Hero
text:
You have a mission that only you can accomplish!
Go and fulfill it!!

name: Hero
text:
You have given us more than enough courage.
So... we will resist as much as we can.

name: Hero
text:
That's it!!!
We're counting on you, Heroes!!!

name: Hero
text:
—Here they come.
You go to the left rear.
I'll take the right.

name: Hero
text:
Leave it to me!!!
I'll do it!!!

name: Barte
text:
...They left.
To think there were such spirited heroes
in this world too...

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—No.
It seems the seeds we sowed
have properly sprouted.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Ah... ah!
Just as I thought!
They're a troublesome bunch...!

name: Gnomon
text:
...We can't afford to waste
the time these people have created for us.

name: Gnomon
text:
—[Player]-sama,
observe the coordinates of that crack.
I will use high-cost movement magic.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Yes.
There's no time for hesitation anymore.
We must close the 'rift' as quickly as possible.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Otherwise, this world and
we ourselves will be finished...!
Alright, let's do this!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
My resolve is already set!!
Let's hurry and put an end to it, shall we!?
This hopeless turmoil, I mean!!

name: Barte
text:
Yeah, before we return to our original world...
I'll forge the ultimate weapon
to save this world!!

Gnomon sent commands to his staff,
matching the coordinates observed by [Player].

The bodies of the group began to glow
and lift into the air.
And then—

All of them became a single streak of light,
and soared into the red-stained sky.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Master.
Finally, the world has begun to break down.
The time of choice you spoke of is approaching.

name: Gnomon
text: But, I...

name: Castle Soldier
text:
—Your Majesty!
The Heroes have finally located
the 'rift' and are heading there!

name: King
text:
Ah... I was just watching.
...We can't let them do all the hard work alone, can we?

name: King
text:
We shall also do what we can.
What... even the observation ability of weak 'Observers' like us
would be better than nothing.

The 'King' rose from his throne,
and thrust the staff he held
into the floor.

Like tree roots spreading,
lines of light ran across the ground,
centering on the staff.

It was the communication 'magic'
that Gnomon used to contact himself.

name: King
text:
To the people of this country... nay.
To Endaira, and to the people remaining in this universe.

name: King
text:
Please, heed the earnest wish
of the king of this small country.
